about_the_game: A 3D Shooting game about hunting kites and other flying objects using home grown weapons in an interactive environment with realistic physics. The Demo version has only two levels from the first environment with a few power ups.
detailed_description: A 3D Shooting game about hunting kites and other flying objects using home grown weapons in an interactive environment with realistic physics. The Demo version has only two levels from the first environment with a few power ups.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: SteamOS
  • Processor: Core i3/Ryzen 3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: SteamOS
  • Processor: NVIDIA 920M/ Radeon Graphics
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA 920M/ Radeon Graphics
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

name: Kite Hunter Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 7
  • Processor: Core i3/Ryzen 3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: Ryzen 5/Core i5 or Higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA 920M/ Radeon Graphics
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Aim for the skies and shoot down the kites. Witness the vivid skyline in rugged weather and lighting that challenges your aiming skills. Discover relics and upgrade munition in a race against time.
